1110800.name: The Slormancer - Original Soundtrack
1110800.description:
The Slormancer – Original Soundtrack

Dive (or dive back) into the epic and quirky universe of The Slormancer with its Official Original Soundtrack!

From frantic battles to mysterious explorations, each track takes you right into the heart of the game. Epic melodies, fiery rhythms, and sounds that scream battle and Slorm!

Whether you're farming Slorm, planning your ultimate build, or just looking for a good excuse to headbang to the beat, this soundtrack is made for you.

Supporting the Team is Good

By purchasing this Original Soundtrack, you're not just listening to great music—you’re also supporting two independent developers who put all their energy and passion into The Slormancer. Every purchase helps us continue enriching the game’s universe and adding even more love (and Slorm).

So, ready to make your ears vibrate with some Slorm in stereo?
